title: Lab attendence
content: How much lab attendence is needed I think I'll have around 76 by the end of the semester, is it ok?

comments.body: Have u done all the experiments? Talk to ur lab teacher about it. They can help u fix ur attendance if u agree to finish incomplete experiments. I spoke to mine last sem and he gladly fixed it up as I had done all the experiments, that too in front of him. So consider talking and fixing it up, otherwise u can get summoned by the HOD for incomplete attendance.
I have done all the experiments  till now 1 is remaining as I wa absent  last time.
